EmailTemplate.description: Auto email sent to dealers when they create a warranty claim
EmailTemplate.name: Auto Confirmation Warranty Case Created
EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber} Has Been Created.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for submitting Case number {!Case.CaseNumber}. This case has been received and someone from the Legend Warranty team is reviewing and will respond shortly.
Thank you,
Legend Warranty Team
